GeneralNotes: Note at end of MS: "Precedentia statuta, excepto statuto de usuris judeorum, fuerunt renovata [a] predicto domino Johanne, in concilio Arelatensi, anno Domini M.CC.XXX.VI, scilicet iii. ydus novembris." [i.e. all statutes reconfirmed in council of 1236 **except those concerning the Jews]
Edition: Gallia christiana novissima, Arles, cols. 382-85, no. 988
